Method Detail

addTeam

public void addTeam(java.lang.String division,
                    Team team)
Adds a team to a division. If division already exists, team is added to division otherwise a new division is created and then team is added to the new division.

Parameters:
division - which team is to be added to.
team - is Team object that will be added to a division.

printOutTable

public void printOutTable(java.lang.String division)
Prints out the statistics for all teams in the division given by the method argument.

Parameters:
division - which division of teams will be printed.

recordResult

public void recordResult(java.lang.String division,
                         java.lang.String teamA,
                         java.lang.String teamB,
                         int teamAScore,
                         int teamBScore)
Updates two specific teams from a division depending on the method argument teamAScore and teamBScore.

Parameters:
division - indicates which division result is for.
teamA - which team played (one of two).
teamB - which team played (one of two).
teamAScore - is number goals teamA scored.
teamBScore - is number goals teamB scored.
